definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
sima (geology)/silicon and magnesium layer in earth's crust
mafic rock (containing magnesium and iron, so comparatively heavy, making oceanic plates)

sentences.english: It is made of Magnesium and Iron Silicate , and it is a member of the Chrysolite mineral family.
sentences.chinese: 它是由鎂，矽鐵，它是一個成員橄欖石礦物家庭。

sentences.english: And magnesium is over a dollar a pound.

sentences.chinese: 各國都在大力開發鎂碳磚生產技術。

sentences.english: Neither magnesium nor boron brought particularly many electrons to MgB2.
sentences.chinese: 在硼化鎂中，鎂跟硼都沒有提供特別多電子。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a light magnesium cement heat preservation exterior wall panel and a processing method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本發明是一種輕質鎂水泥保溫外牆板及其加工方法。

sentences.english: A-1L-AJ bricks on outlet are more than two times of imported Mg-Cr bricks in service life.

sentences.english: The electrochemical synthesis of anthracene magnesium by using sacrificial magnesium anode and'carbon cathode was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了消耗性鎂陽極存在下蒽鎂爲有機電合成。

sentences.english: Zirconium in rare earth - magnesium - zirconium master alloy was determined by EDTA titrimetry.
sentences.chinese: 採用EDTA滴定法測定了稀土鎂鋯中間合金中的鋯。

sentences.english: When the alloy contains no or excess magnesium, its creep properties will decline.
sentences.chinese: 不含鎂或鎂含量過高的合金，其蠕變性能均有所下降。

sentences.english: Other Ingredients: Kosher gelatin (capsule), cellulose, silicon dioxide and magnesium stearate.
sentences.chinese: 凝膠，纖維，二氧化硅和硬脂酸鎂。

sentences.english: Calcium magnesium acetate was the best additive as for the combustion-supporting character.
sentences.chinese: 其中，醋酸鈣鎂的助燃效果最好。

sentences.english: Do we have magnesium to do this?

sentences.chinese: 實驗組低鎂發生率隨消化道反應程度增高而增加。

sentences.english: Biotite is a subordinate constituent of the mafic and ultramafic rocks generally.
sentences.chinese: 黑雲母一般是鎂鐵質及超鎂鐵質岩石中的次要成分。
